faq.question: Where do I find tip sheets for ambulatory workflows?
faq.answer: Press F1 → Learning Home Dashboard → select role → Tip Sheets section.

faq.question: How do I set a patient’s preferred lab?
faq.answer: During rooming, in the Rooming Navigator, select Labs → mark preferred lab.

faq.question: Why isn’t my Medicare Wellness form showing?
faq.answer: Scroll to bottom of Screenings Navigator; if missing, check visit type and provider setup.

faq.question: What’s the difference between internal and external referrals?
faq.answer: Internal referrals often require prior auth and are routed in-system; external go outside Epic network.

faq.question: A provider is missing from referral orders. What do I do?
faq.answer: Use the FIND tool to enroll the provider into Epic, or contact credentialing if not listed.
